title: Zeit Point One PerTrend Inflation 7/13: Inflation, Uvalde, Harrison Ford, Trump, NYT Poll, Netflix X Microsoft, The Munsters
itunes:title: Zeit Point One PerTrend Inflation 7/13: Inflation, Uvalde, Harrison Ford, Trump, NYT Poll, Netflix X Microsoft, The Munsters
description:
In this edition of Zeit Point One PerTrend Inflation, Jack and Miles discuss rising inflation, a newly released video from Uvalde, Harrison Ford turning 80, Trump vs. Musk, American voters wanting to upend the system, the Netflix X Microsoft collab, and Rob Zombie's 'the Munsters' reboot!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
